title: Govt to review outdated circulars, including civil servants’ shareholding rules
desc: The public service department says circulars over 20 years old or no longer relevant will be updated to reflect changes in governance, the economy and technology.

title: Strike by Air New Zealand flight attendants leaves traveller in limbo

title: Tax refund payments ahead of schedule, full settlement by Feb 2026
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: The Government is aiming to complete tax refund payments for the Year of Assessment 2023 ahead of schedule, with full settlement now expected by February 2026, earlier than its original first-quarter target, says Datuk Seri Amir Hamzah Azizan.

title: Israel’s 'generous' burial policy to become unsustainable as population ages, study warns
desc: With annual death toll expected to double by the mid-2040s, report from Taub Center calls to rethink current approach to burials, including adopting higher density practices to prevent 'cities of the dead'

title: SENSEX falls over 350 points, NIFTY50 below 25,850; Infosys, TCS among top drags
desc: The SENSEX fell as much as 395 points and NIFTY50 index touched an intraday low of 25,836 dragged down by losses in index heavyweights like Infosys and Tata Consultancy Services.

title: Mount Maunganui landslide: Paul Davison named to lead Tauranga City Council probe

title: Singapore To Host Special Viewing Event For March's Total Lunar Eclipse
desc: The Lion City will witness a rare total lunar eclipse on March 3. Here’s how to watch it at Science Centre Singapore and what to expect.

title: Probe finds Air India crash was intentional, pilot turned off fuel switch: Report
desc: Air India flight AI 171 crash was likely caused by a deliberate pilot action. The findings raise concerns over pilot mental health and aviation safety standards in India.
